title: All wifi connections listed as "no internet" for my Pixel 3 XL AND my Pixel 2 XL.
content:
I reset my network settings, hard reset the Pixel 3 XL, changed all settings on my modem (5G, 2.4GH, etc)
Both phones keep telling me "connected to wifi, no internet" on all wifi networks I've connected to. The only exception was hot_spotting to a phone and accessing 5G that way - clearly not a solution, however.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
